text.text: Welcome to Blockbench 4.2, the Panel Update!

features.title: Moveable Panels!
features.text: Inverse Kinematics allow you to animate a chain of bones by just moving the end point!

features.title: Texture Editing!
features.text: The new GIF recorder allows you to crop your GIF to just the content you need!

features.title: Move Texture with UV
features.text: With Collada support you can export your models directly into Unity and other programs!
